overview:
Chirag Desai serves as the Director of Technical Services at Amaeya.

Chirag is a young veteran of the Software-as-a-Service industry, with intensive experience in deploying delivering Managed Services and Managed Security Services. With a variety of experience in the Middle Eastern, European and American markets, he has worked closely with organizations to help build NOC-based service offerings, working with teams delivering system administration, network administration and security.

Chirag was also recently named in ACN’s Annual Middle East 30-under-30 list of IT professionals.

Chirag loves social media, and you can catch him on twitter by following @chiragnd.
